solution_line_template: In two years, Lennon will be {years_in_future}+{lennon_current_age} = <<{years_in_future}+{lennon_current_age}={lennon_future_age}>>{lennon_future_age} years old.
Ophelia will be {ophelia_multiplier}*{lennon_future_age} = <<{ophelia_multiplier}*{lennon_future_age}={ophelia_future_age}>>{ophelia_future_age} years old in two years.
